front.title: Use Identity as Raw Public Key in EAP-TLS

abstract.t: This document specifies the use of identity as a raw public key in EAP-TLS, the procedure of EAP-TIBS is consistent with EAP-TLS's interactive process, identity-based signature is extended to support EAP-TLS's signature algorithms to avoid X.509 certificates, this authentication method can avoid the overhead of receiving and processing certificate chains.
